questionCopy: Do you have an Emergency Plan?
Do you have an Evacuation Plan?
Are these plans posted?
Can I see them?
Who approves your Emergency Plan?
Who approves your Evacuation Plan?
Is your facility built to withstand tornados (if applicable)?
Is your facility built to withstand hurricanes (if applicable)?
Is your facility built to withstand earthquakes (if applicable)?
Do you notify the family prior to an evacuation when possible?
Where do you take the residents if there is a need for evacuation?
Can I have the address and phone number of that facility?
Can the family decide if they want to take the resident home?
Who determines when the facility should be evacuated?
Were you here the last time there was an evacuation?
Are you a host facility for another community in the area?
Do you have enough supplies for the residents if you host another community?
Can I see your emergency supplies?
What is your policy concerning food, water, and medication during an emergency?
Are you in a flood zone?
Do you have Fire Drills?
How often?
What are your regulations concerning smoking?
What are your regulations concerning alcohol consumption?
Do you have a security guard on duty at night?
Are all doors locked at night?
Do you have a sprinkler system in all of the rooms as well as the common areas?
Do you have a generator?
Will your elevator still work in a blackout?
How quickly are calls for assistance responded to?
Is there enough staff to meet the residents' needs?
